name: PHILADELPHIA® Fruit Pizza
author: Philadelphia
summary: On a baked cookie 'crust,' arrange sliced kiwi, berries and mandarin orange segments on a creamy layer of 'sauce' for a pretty summer dessert.
ingredients: 1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sliceable sugar cookies, sliced
1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
4 cups assorted cut-up fruit (kiwi, strawberries, blueberries, drained canned mandarin oranges)
¼ cup apricot preserves, pressed through sieve to remove lumps
directions: Line 12-inch pizza pan with foil; spray with cooking spray
Arrange cookie dough slices in single layer in prepared pan; press together to form crust
Invert onto plate; carefully remove foil
Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla with mixer until well blended
Mix preserves and water; brush over fruit
